price: Then We awakened them so that We may see which of the two parties would be more precise in calculating the length of their stay.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا
